name: Save My Pets
description:
Whatch out for the vulture and the electricity!!!
Use the "left" <== and ==> "right" arrows to save the pets and take them to the ambulance. Also use the left ctrl to give an additional boost, but remember, this boost is limited! Try to save as many pets as you can!
Save as many pet as possible to earn star and open up to 3 levels in this version.
This is a pre-alpha version! graphics and sound improvements as well as hud, new leves, mechanics and challenges will be added. We would like your evaluation: flavioguerra.3d@gmail.com
Bugs exist an can be reported at: flavioguerra.3d@gmail.com
CREATED and DEVELOPED by Flavio Guerra
ARTS by Bruno Leão e Rafael Ridolph
